segments.text: Well , it's illegal to bring food and drinks into the theater .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No wonder you brought such a big bag today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Those are the ones that are pre-dipped in sweet coating !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . And there's real strawberry chunks in the coating .
segments.speaker: S2
